briefTitle: Levo-Dexa vs. Tobra+Dexa for Prevention and Treatment of Inflammation and Prevention of Infection in Cataract Surgery
officialTitle: An International, Multicenter, Randomized, Blinded-assessor, Parallel-group Clinical Study Comparing Eye Drops of Combined LEvofloxAcin + DExamethasone foR 7 Days Followed by Dexamethasone Alone for an Additional 7 Days vs. Tobramycin + Dexamethasone for 14 Days for the Prevention and Treatment of Inflammation and Prevention of Infection Associated With Cataract Surgery in Adults - LEADER 7
summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the non-inferiority of the study treatment (combined levofloxacin + dexamethasone eye drops) followed by dexamethasone eye drops alone vs. standard treatment in the prevention and treatment of postoperative ocular inflammation and prevention of infection.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Without Signs of Anterior Chamber Inflammation
